department: Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
short_summary: Interior painting services for Embassy of Canada to Chile in Santiago.
description: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires interior painting services for the Embassy of Canada to Chile in Santiago. The Request for Proposal (RFP) in Spanish can be found attached to the English and French RFP.
full_summary:
**Tender Notification**
================OLT Corner>
### **Project Title**
#### Painting Services for the Embassy of Canada to Chile in Santiago

#### **Tender Reference Number**
`CB-947-94898082`

#### **Amendment Number**
`7`

#### **Solicitation Number**
`24-245950B`

#### **Publication Date**
`2024-01-15`

#### **Tender Closing Date and Time**
`2024-02-02 14:00:00`

#### **Amendment Date**
`2024-02-02`

#### **Contract Duration**
The contract is expected to start on an unspecified date and end on an unspecified date.

#### **Status**
This tender has already closed.

### **Scope of Work**
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) is seeking a contractor to provide interior painting services for the Embassy of Canada to Chile in Santiago. 

### **Trade Agreements**
This tender falls under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### **Regions of Opportunity**
Worldwide

### **Regions of Delivery**
Chile

### **Contracting Entity**
Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD)
Address: 125 Sussex Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0G2, Canada

### **Contact Information**
Jenny Mascarenhas
Email: [realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca](mailto:realproperty-contracts@international.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 292-8946

### **Attachments**
Attachments can be found at the following URLs:
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29260/24-245950b---addendum-002.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29260/24-245950b---rfp-english-final-update.pdf
- https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/29260/24-245950b---rfp-french-final-updated.pdf
